Instructions

1. Download the files above.

2. Install Office from the first link, using the serial provided.

3. Accept the Microsoft Software License Terms (terms and conditions)

4. Click Install Now, or click customise and choose the features you want.

5. When the installation has finished, visit

www.microsoft.com/genuine/office/whyvalidate.aspx?displaylang=en

in INTERNET EXPLORER, NOT Firefox

6. Click validate now, making sure to install the required active x plugin

7. It will tell you your office is invalid.

8. Copy OGACheckControl.dll from the 3rd rar file into C:windowssystem32 (or replace C with your current Drive letter), clicking Yes when it asks if you want to replace the file.

9. Visit

www.microsoft.com/genuine/office/whyvalidate.aspx?displaylang=en

again, and click validate now. Congratulations, your office is now genuine! But we're not finished yet.

10. Don't start office yet.

11. Copy MSO.dll from the 4th rar file, into C:Program FilesCommon Filesmicrosoft sharedOFFICE12 (or replace C with your current Drive letter), clicking Yes when it asks if you want to replace the file.

12. Open Word 2007 and when it asks how you would like to activate office, choose telephone.

13. Enter in all zeros (0) for the confirmation code.

14. Done. Office Ultimate is now genuine and activated.


You can install SP1 Update here:

And copy it to C:Program FilesCommon Filesmicrosoft sharedOFFICE12 (or replace C with your current Drive letter), clicking Yes when it asks if you want to replace the file.
Done!!!

About the second day after installation, you will get this error:
"Microsoft Office has not been installed for this user"

To fix this problem:
1. Open the Microsoft Office installer

2. Select the "repair option"

3. After repairing is completed, once again replace all the .dll files with the ones that I have provided (a second time)

4. Now it should be working forever


The reason this has happened is because of microsoft's new validation method, but as you can see there is a way to bypass it.
